CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( mardi_fin_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))-VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( mardi_debut_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', '')) <= 200, VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( mercredi_fin_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))-VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( mercredi_debut_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', '')) <= 200, VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( jeudi_fin_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))-VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( jeudi_debut_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', '')) <= 200, VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( vendredi_fin_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))-VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( vendredi_debut_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', '')) <= 200, VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( samedi_fin_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))-VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( samedi_debut_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', '')) <= 200 ),
IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", ""), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "") )
CustomField.label: Pause d√©jeuner <= 2h
